name: Color Fruits Link
description:
Waterring free fruit match-3 puzzle game, connect the same color fruits vertically, horizontally or diagonally as much as you can.

Splash the juice and clear up the plate, to be the king of the mania fruit farm!

TIPS:
- Match three action puzzle gameplay.
- Burst bunches of fruits & remove fruits in juicy explosion.
- Colorful and vivid fruits.
- Easy to learn, hard to master.
- Exciting and delicious fruit trip.
